alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 2:34PM MDT until June 07 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND EAST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 233 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Curlew Lake to 8 miles west of Wicksville to 3 miles south of New Underwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wicksville, Owanka, Wasta and northern Badlands National Park. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 73 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
